list-item.p: Mathematical considerations of a SEIQR model to describe the propagation of COVID-19 are proposed.
We derive analytically the reproductive number and the equilibria with and without COVID-19.
Necessary and sufficient conditions for the stability of the equilibria are mathematically established.
An efficient nonstandard method to solve the continuous problem is proposed and analyzed.
The numerical simulations confirm the analytical and numerical results derived in this work.
